name.japanese: サラサラの実 モデル：アホロートル
name.romanized: Sara Sara no Mi, Moderu: Ahorōtoru

keyMoments.title: Smiley's Fragments Attack
keyMoments.description: The Sara Sara no Mi's effects are shown as Smiley uses its abilities to launch fragments of itself across Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the unique application of a Zoan fruit to inanimate poison gas.

keyMoments.title: Caesar Explains Smiley's Nature
keyMoments.description: Caesar reveals that Smiley was created by feeding the Sara Sara no Mi to compressed H2S poison gas, bringing it to life.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the unique and horrifying application of Devil Fruit animation to weaponize poison gas.

abilitiesRevealed.description: Can separate into multiple pieces while maintaining cohesion and launching fragments across long distances
Fragments emit toxic H2S gas and explode violently when exposed to fire

weaknesses.description: Smiley is weak against water, which limits its ability to cross bodies of water
